Privacy/Data Collection
This website (the “Site”) is published and maintained by Source Development Group. Source Development Group will not collect personal data (name, address, phone number, email address) through this website unless you provide it voluntarily. If you provide personal data, we may use it to better understand your needs and to improve our products and services. We may use that data to provide you with information you have requested from us and to contact you. Our users are given the opportunity to “opt out” if they do not wish to receive promotional materials from us by replying to these communications with “unsubscribe” in the subject line of the e-mail or by e-mailing us at remove@seabridgebahamas.com. We may provide third parties with aggregate (not individual) information about visitors to our Site. We will not sell, rent or market personal data to third parties.

In some cases, we may automatically collect technical information when you connect to our website. Such information (typically the internet browser and computer operating system you are using) is not personally identifiable. We may store some information in your computer in the form of a “cookie.” Cookies let us tailor our website to your interests and preferences. Refer to your internet browser for information about how to erase or block cookies.

Children
Source Development Group has no intention of collecting any personal data from children under 13 years of age and does not knowingly solicit data from, or market to, children under 18 years of age. Parents should be aware that our privacy policy will govern our own collection and use of personal data. However, information voluntarily given by children in chat sessions, email exchanges, bulletin boards, etc., may be used by other parties to generate unsolicited email. We encourage all parents to instruct their children in the safe and responsible use of their personal data while on the internet.

Ownership
All materials on this Site, including but not limited to its design, text, audio, images, software, video clips, and the look and feel of the Site (the “Content”), are protected by copyright under U.S. copyright law. Except as specified herein, you may not use or copy the Content in any manner. You agree to follow all instructions on this Site limiting the way you may use the Content. There are a number of proprietary logos, service marks and trademarks found on this Site. By making them available on this Site, Source Development Group is not granting you any license to utilize those proprietary logos, service marks, or trademarks. Any unauthorized use of the Content may violate copyright laws, trademark laws, the laws of privacy and publicity, and civil and criminal statutes.

Site and Its Contents
You may not distribute, exchange, modify, sell or transmit anything you copy from this Site, including, but not limited to, any text, images, audio and video. In complying with these terms, Source Development Group grants you a nonexclusive, nontransferable, limited right to enter, display and use this Site. You agree not to interrupt or attempt to interrupt the operation of this Site in any way.

User’s Communications or Materials
Any communications or materials sent to the Site by electronic mail or otherwise, including any comments, data, questions, suggestions or the like are, and will be treated as, nonconfidential and nonproprietary. Thus, you give up any claim that any use of such material violates any of your rights including moral rights, privacy rights, proprietary or other property rights, publicity rights, rights to credit for material or ideas, or any other right, including the right to approve the way Source Development Group uses such material.

Any material submitted to this Site may be adapted, broadcast, changed, copied, disclosed, licensed, performed, posted, published, sold, transmitted or used by Source Development Group anywhere in the world, in any medium, forever. Without any compensation to you, Source Development Group is free to use any concepts, ideas, know how or techniques contained in any communication you send to the Site for any purpose whatsoever, including but not limited to developing, manufacturing and marketing products using such information. However, you understand that we are not obligated to use any such ideas or materials and you have no right to compel such use.

Transmissions
You are aware that Internet transmissions cannot be guaranteed as completely private or secure. Any message or information you send to this Site might be read or intercepted by others unless a particular message is encrypted.

Links to Other Sites
This Site may contain links to other internet sites. Source Development Group provides such links for your convenience only, and is not responsible for the content of any linked site or their privacy practices. Links from this Site to any other site do not mean that we approve of, endorse or recommend that site.
